SaveData module¶

OPENGUI SaveData module

The SaveData module contains all of the methods of data storage and manipulation for OPENGUI. In this module there are methods to write and read from csv/txt files.

SaveData.readFromCSV(filename)¶

Reads data from a csv/txt file to the data grid.

Currently takes the data from a csv or txt file (or any file containing text) and stores it line by line into the data grid. Newline is considered a line of data, so every newline will write the following data in the next row etc.

Parameters

filename – The chosen filename to read the data from.

Returns

List of data taken from the file.

Return type

returndata

SaveData.writeToCSV(data, name, filetype)¶

Writes data from the data grid to a csv/txt file.

Currently takes the data from the data grid and stores it line by line into a csv or txt file. The filetype is chosen by the user from a dialogue box option. No returns, however the output data is written to a file that is saved in the local directory.

Parameters

  • data – The data array taken from the data grid (line by line with existing text).

  • name – The filename (taken from the dialogue box user input).

  • filetype – The file type to be saved as (currently either csv or txt).
